item.title: Matrix Related OA Questions
item.description: Today I found an interesting OA question related to printing matrix in spiral order, and had a shot at it. Simply googling it I find another question related to checking Toeplitz Matrix. I will keep updating this post once I found more interesting questions related to matrix operations.
